sources.title: Porky's Picnic (1939)
sources.description: Porky, his girlfriend Petunia and Porky's nephew Pinkie head to the country to have a picnic. Naughty little Pinkie plays all sorts of cruel tricks on Porky by pulling the sidecar's pin, taking scissors to a squirrel and bashing his uncle. However, everything happens out of Petunia's sight. The day heads even further south in a hurry once the under supervised kid heads over to the nearby zoo. In a dizzying climax, Porky must retrieve the child from various animals' cages. Pinkie finally gets into trouble, getting a dose of his own medicine in the end. This is a Computer Colorized version from 1995.

metadata.Plot: Porky asks Petunia on a picnic. Unfortunately, bratty baby Pinkie tags along. First he separates their sidecar from Porky's scooter, then he torments a squirrel with scissors and Porky with a board, then he sneaks into the animal cages at the zoo. Porky saves him, earning a big kiss from Petunia. Finally, Pinkie sneaks up on a cute little chipmunk with the scissors and the chipmunk gets even.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Bernice Hansen, Shirley Reed
